DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety , tolerability , immunogenicity measles , mumps , rubella , varicella ( MMRV ) vaccine make alternative manufacturing process 2006 process
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity Measles , Mumps , Rubella , Varicella ( MMRV ) Vaccine Made With Alternative Manufacturing Process ( AMP ) ( V221-027 )
DOC.criteria: Negative clinical history measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster Received measles , mumps , rubella , varicella vaccine , either alone combination time prior study , anticipate receive vaccine outside study protocol , either alone combination , study Received immune globulin , blood transfusion bloodderived product ( include autologous blood/blood product ) within 5 month ( 150 day ) prior dose study vaccine plan receive product enrol study Exposed measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster within 4 week prior study vaccination Any congenital acquire immune deficiency , neoplastic disease , depressed immunity , include result steroid use immunosuppressive therapy Received 1 ) systemic immunomodulatory steroid [ great equivalent 2 mg/kg total daily dose prednisone ] within 3 month prior enter study , 2 ) dose systemic immunomodulatory steroid within 7 day prior enter study , 3 ) expect require systemic immunomodulatory steroid course study History allergy anaphylactoid reaction gelatin , sorbitol , neomycin , egg protein ( egg egg product ) , chicken protein , component study vaccine Received salicylate ( eg , aspirin aspirincontaining product ) within 14 day prior study vaccination Diagnosis active neurological disorder . Enrollment may consider disease process stabilize History seizure disorder , include single febrile seizure Diagnosis active untreated tuberculosis History thrombocytopenia Born human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infect mother
